auth.auth/invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted.
auth.auth/user-disabled: Your account has been disabled by an administrator.
auth.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
auth.auth/operation-not-allowed: The given sign-in provider is disabled for this Firebase project.
auth.auth/user-not-found: There is no user corresponding to the provided identifier.
auth.auth/weak-password: The password is not strong enough.
auth.auth/email-change-needs-verification: You need to verify your new email address before this change can be applied.
auth.auth/credential-already-in-use: This credential is already associated with a different user account.
auth.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials.
auth.auth/requires-recent-login: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Log in again before retrying this request.
auth.auth/provider-already-linked: User can only be linked to one identity for the given provider.
auth.auth/invalid-credential: The credential used is malformed or has expired.
auth.auth/invalid-verification-code: The verification code used is invalid.
auth.auth/invalid-verification-id: The verification ID used is invalid.
auth.auth/invalid-action-code: The action code is invalid. This can happen if the code is malformed, expired, or has already been used.
auth.auth/too-many-requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts.
auth.auth/reset-password-error: We couldn't reset your password. Please try again later.
auth.auth/verify-email-error: We couldn't verify your email address. Please try again later.

firestore.unavailable: The Firestore service is unavailable at the moment. Please try again later.
firestore.unauthenticated: You must be authenticated to access this resource.
firestore.permission-denied: You do not have permission to access this document.
firestore.not-found: The document you requested does not exist.
firestore.already-exists: A document with the same ID already exists.
firestore.resource-exhausted: Your project has exceeded its quota for Firestore resources.
firestore.failed-precondition: Your request could not be completed due to a conflict.
firestore.aborted: The operation was aborted because another operation failed.
firestore.invalid-argument: Invalid or missing arguments were provided.
firestore.deadline-exceeded: The deadline for this operation has been exceeded.
firestore.not-implemented: This operation is not implemented on the server.
firestore.internal: An internal server error has occurred. Please try again later.
firestore.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again.
